EEPROM UPDATE

You are going to update EEPROM area (calibration data) on the device.
Please, choose file from your local hard drive and click Update EEPROM button.

WARNINGS
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • you can upload whatever you want, so be sure that you choose proper EEPROM image for your device
You can find more information about this project on GitHub
